Hmm! Looks like micro.blog does not always include the canonical URL when cross-posting to fbook. Troublesome. Well, this is a work in progress. Will keep fiddling.
If this topic interests you, and assuming fbook even shows you this post (spit), let me know. Happy to discuss. :)

I like that, because if one of those advertising companies goes out of business, or just plain decides my post doesn‚Äôt fit their algorithm, I‚Äôve still got a link I can send anyone and they can go look at it.

This is why phrases like the ‚Äúopen web‚Äù and ‚Äúnet neutrality‚Äù matter.

Broken link that previous post: micro.blog

You can see this post has a canonical URL at a domain I control: danj.ca. So I can make quick, Twitter/Instagram-like posts from my own, and they can be syndicated here, but the content is mine.
